# W6895-210080 - Underground Utilities Repair Contract

### Title
- English: W6895-210080 - Underground Utilities Repair Contract
- French: W6895-210080 - Contrat de réparation des services publics souterrains

### Reference
- Reference Number: WS3712297983-Doc3790478538
- Amendment Number: 1

### Tender Details
- Solicitation Number: WS3712297983
- Publication Date: 2022-12-16
- Tender Closing Date: 2023-01-12T14:00:00
- Amendment Date: 2022-12-16
- Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-02-01
- Expected Contract End Date: 2026-02-01
- Tender Status: Expired

### Required Services
This contract is for a three-year Standing Offer (SO) for underground utilities repair services at 4 Wing, CFB Cold Lake, Alberta.

- Services to be provided include excavating, repairing, and backfilling of underground utilities
- Work to be carried out under this contract will be on an "as required" basis
- It is anticipated that two firms will be issued a Standing Offer

### Contract Information
- Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
- Address (French): 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Québec, K1A 0S5
- End User: Department of National Defence (DND)
- Address (English): 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada
- Address (French): 101, promenade Colonel By, Ottawa, Québec, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact Information
- Name: Mike Fagan (SPAC/PSPC)
- Email: [mike.fagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mike.fagan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- Phone: Not provided
- Fax: Not provided
- Address: Not provided

### Trade Agreements
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Region
- Service delivery region: Alberta

### Procurement Method
- Competitive - open bidding
